front.title: Guidelines for Acting as an IETF Liaison to Another Organization

abstract.t: Whenever IETF decides to enter into a liaison relationship with another organization, such as a Standards Development Organization (SDO), a consortium, or an industrial forum, a liaison manager is appointed. The procedures used by the IAB to establish and maintain liaison relationships between the IETF and other organizations are described in RFC 4052 [RFC4052]. This document gives guidelines on expectations, tasks, responsibilities and mandate of the liaison managers.
